node.name: Port Finance International Istanbul 2015
node.description: 2015 will see Port Finance International return to Istanbul for its 6th year. The conference will once again bring together an illustrious line up of speakers with port industry experts and financiers to discuss this exciting economy, which is widely predicted to be the world’s second fastest growing by 2018.

node.name: Kazan Sukuk Conference 2015
node.description: The Russian Federations main platform for entering the Eastern finance markets – Kazan Sukuk Conference 2015 – is organized by Islamic Business and Finance Development Fund – the center of competence in Islamic Business and Finance of Russia. It is scheduled to take place on April 9, 2015 at Mirage hotel, Kazan.

node.name: FT Turkey Summit
node.description: Now in its third year, the FT Turkey Summit has become established as the premium gathering for international investors, senior government officials and leading Turkish corporates.

node.name: Building Future Learning Spaces
node.description: Essential forum on designing education facilities to meet growing student numbers in the region.

node.name: Power & Transmission Summit
node.description: Nispana is proud to present the 2nd Annual Power & Transmission Summit which will take place on the 18th - 19th March 2015 at the Hotel Al Khozama in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The conference will cover power generation, transmission and distribution.

node.name: The 2nd Annual Waste Management Summit
node.description: Today waste management and waste disposal is a growing global concern and countries in the Middle East are the highest generators of waste in the world. Waste if not managed and handled properly can have adverse affects on human and community health.

node.name: THE FUTURE OF ISLAMIC FINANCE
node.description: Ahead of the conference, the organisers will publish a unique set of selected essays that captures the agenda of the Dubai Executive Summit. Written in an engaging style, these essays are meant to appeal to a wider audience and to reach scholars in other disciplines outside of Islamic Finance.

node.name: World Halal Conference 2015
node.description: The theme for WHC 2015 “Halal Economy – A Profitable Convergence” reflects upon the need for a renewed global effort amongst halal stakeholders to further strengthen the integration of industries within the halal eco-system towards the realization of a holistic halal economy.

node.name: Natural Resources and Commodities Finance 2015
node.description: TXF's Natural Resources and Commodities Finance event is returning to Amsterdam this May with an addition - the industry dinner.

node.name: The Global Operation Strategy in Financial Services
node.description: An organization's goal is to maintain an organic structure that ensures a win-win proposition for its people, processes involved, stakeholders and customers. Irrespective of the business and its size, a sound operational strategy is required to ensure robust performance, enhanced productivity, increase cash flow and operationally excellence.

node.name: MCE SAUDI 2015
node.description: Mostra Convegno Expocomfort, the globally-renowned exhibition dedicated to residential and industrial installations, air-conditioning and renewable energy, is coming to Saudi Arabia.

node.name: Kingdom Asset Development Forum
node.description: The asset development forum will bring together leaders in the financial sector and other industry leaders to discuss and brainstorm the investment potential and opportunity for asset development in Saudi Arabia.

node.name: 2nd Kingdom Operational Excellence in Financial Services
node.description: Attend and experience the opportunity to learn and interact directly with COOs, CIOs and operation excellence specialists and technologists who will share and determine the importance of operational excellence across all banking and financial processes.

node.name: The Mexican Energy Forum
node.description: The Mexican Energy Forum will be held in response to the recent Energy Reforms in Mexico and will be covering the complete spectrum of Mexico’s opportunities in the energy sector, assessing key investment areas in the upstream, midstream/infrastructure, electricity, power and downstream sector. The event will also cover important industry priorities and challenges, including local content, security, fiscal terms and more.

node.name: EGYPT'S RENEWABLE ENERGY SUMMIT
node.description: Egypt's Renewable Energy Summit is Egypt’s largest gathering on renewable energy, divided into a huge Exhibition and a two day Conference.

node.name: Trading Show Chicago 2015
node.description: Chicago's leading quant, automated trading, exchange technology, big data and derivatives event

node.name: Real Estate Investment World Latin America 2015
node.description: Through a combination of strategic keynote presentations, insightful case studies, collaborative roundtable discussions and 1-2-1 partnering, Real Estate Investment World Latin America gives you the opportunity to design your own conference experience so your time away from the office is well spent. Your competition will be there, can you afford not to be?

node.name: Private Equity World Latin America 2015
node.description: Through a combination of strategic keynote presentations, insightful case studies, collaborative roundtable discussions and 1-2-1 partnering, Private Equity World Latin America gives you the opportunity to network, meet new industry contacts and generate sales leads. Don't miss out! Your competitors will be there - can you afford not to?

node.name: The 3rd Oman Customer Care Conference
node.description: The rapid growth of the Service Industry in Oman has given an unparalleled opportunity for both the government and private sectors to establish a more focused and strategic approach towards their customers and to review their traditional processes.

node.name: Extraordinary Women Conference
node.description: We all have our journeys, however some stand out more than others given the insurmountable odds and obstacles faced. Such journeys inspire us all and show us how it is still possible to reach our goals despite the obstacles and setbacks faced on the way. The 3rd edition of Extraordinary Women Conference covers all these essentials, sharing the message of hope and success to all women in Oman.

node.name: AFRIWOOD 2015
node.description: AFRIWOOD 2015 is the foremost exhibition that offers you a chance to meet wood and woodworking professionals and develop ideas for increasing the range and quality of one's business.

node.name: Solar Africa
node.description: The overwhelming response from the Solar Industry has encouraged Expogroup to launch Solar Africa Exhibition to be held concurrently with P&E Africa.

node.description: Autoexpo Africa continues to cater the rising demand of the Automotives, Spares and Accessories market for the 18th consecutive year.

node.name: WEPower
node.description: For 11 years, WEPower has delivered a platform for local and international suppliers and technology providers to discuss major projects to deliver water and power solutions to one of the largest economies in the world: Saudi Arabia.

node.name: Power & Transmission Summit
node.description: Hence Nispana is proud to present the 2nd Annual Power & Transmission Summit which will take place on the 18th - 19th March 2015 at the Hotel Al Khozama in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

node.name: Africa Energy Forum
node.description: The Africa Energy Forum (AEF) is the only international Forum focussed on power generation for Africa with attendance restricted to stakeholders (investors, consultants, developers, ministries, utilities, regulators etc.) from the power sector. AEF comes to the UAE for the first time to capture the massive potential of Middle Eastern investment, and to learn from a region that has successfully built its gas based economy into a booming global empire.

node.name: Powering Africa: Mozambique 2015
node.description: The 4th Annual Powering Africa: Mozambique meeting will take place from 7-8th May in Maputo, focusing on investment opportunities within Mozambique’s gas and renewable energy sectors.

node.name: INTERSOLAR SUMMIT TURKEY
node.description: Dedicated to the development of the solar industry, Intersolar Summits’ mission is to provide in-depth education, enable high-quality networking opportunities, expand the use of all solar technologies at national and regional level and strengthen local solar industries.

node.name: CommunicAsia2015
node.description: The rising size of mobile workforce and increasingly complex user demands, coupled with the proliferation of connected devices has made this industry more dynamic than ever. It has also blurred the line between work and personal time as seen in the rise of mobility driven innovations such as smart living solutions, wearable technologies and many more.

node.name: West Latin America Oil & Gas 2015 Summit
node.description: International Research Networks (IRN) together with Grupo BG de Eventos are proud to introduce the inaugural West Latin America Oil & Gas 2015 Summit, taking place on 16th-17th June in Cartagena, Colombia.

node.name: The 3rd Annual HSSE Forum

node.name: Investing in Turkey Forum

node.name: Cityscape Qatar
node.description: With exciting new features and business focused networking opportunities, Cityscape Qatar continues to be the largest real estate event ever to be held in the State of Qatar.

node.description: Cityscape Qatar ended its 2014 edition on a high after three days of exhibitions, panel discussions, networking and awards ceremony resulted in the conclusion of a number of deals. The 2015 edition will begin on May 11.

node.name: The First Global Islamic Investment Gateway
node.description: This will be the premier investment event for Islamic markets that brings together key investment decision makers and opportunities to facilitate cross-border investment flows. Islamic markets represent the next frontier of high growth investment. They have a combined GDP of US$6.7 trillion growing at an average of 5.4% and a population base of 1.6 billion people growing at twice the global rate.

node.name: The PPP Healthcare Summit

node.name: The Oil Barons Charity Ball
node.description: The 2015 programme for this prestigious glittering event has just been announced and features an exciting red carpet welcome reception and VIP pre function area with a breathtaking performance before dinner from soul singer Jae Franklin.

node.name: The World Aviation Safety Summit
node.description: The World Aviation Safety Summit will bring together local and international stakeholders from regulatory authorities, airline operators, airport operators, aircraft manufactures, pilot associations, safety organisations and air traffic control service providers to discuss key strategies and challenges in improving safety culture.

node.name: The Outdoor Design & Build Show
node.description: Outdoor Design and Build, now running for the third consecutive year, is an annual B2B trade show held in Dubai, UAE. node.name: The Azerbaijan Investment Summit

node.name: MENA HR in Financial Services
node.description: Managing human resources is emerging as the critical element in maintaining an effective and credible workforce in fast changing environment across the financial segment. This summit will be gathering of the best minds in the financial industry to discuss the solutions they have implemented to deal with the changing environment in human capital and how it can be incorporated in the financial sectors.

node.name: Influential HR Summit
node.description: This is an excellent event for Senior HR Leaders from international or local, yet expanding organisations and their HR leaders to exchange and share expertise, engage and network.

node.name: Mexico Electric Power Summit

node.name: Bonds, Loans & Derivatives Andes

node.name: Energy, Oil & Gas Investor Summit
node.description: The conference will act as a catalyst for junior and midcap energy and oil and gas companies to raise capital for their exploration and production projects. By connecting energy companies with the world’s leading investors.

node.name: 3RD MEXICO OIL & GAS SUMMIT AND LEADERSHIP FORUM 2015
node.description: After two successful Mexico Energy Summits, BNamericas Events has decided to split the event in two: In 2015 we will hold the Mexico Oil & Gas Summit and the Mexico Electric Power Summit. We based the decision on the strong momentum observed in Mexico’s energy market following the approval of the energy reform and its secondary laws.

node.name: Cityscape Abu Dhabi 2015
node.description:
As confidence returns to the Abu Dhabi's real estate market, major developers, service suppliers and government bodies will participate in the region's leading Real-Estate event which has long been identified as a barometer for the industry.

Connect with leading real estate professionals, keep up to date with the latest trends in global real estate, and develop business opportunities with over 100 exhibiting companies during a 3 day exhibition you cannot afford to miss.

node.name: The 4th Mexico Infrastructure Summit.
node.description: Planned projects such as Mexico City’s new airport, the Mexico City-Queretaro high-speed rail, countless roads and highways, and the expansion of Veracruz port will be some of the topics to be discussed at the 4th Mexico Infrastructure Summit.

node.name: The 2nd Latam Caribbean Ports and Logistics Summit
node.description: The focus of the 2nd Latam Caribbean Ports and Logistics Summit is analyze ongoing and planned projects, as well as new public policies and the port industry’s strategies to increase logistics competitiveness, as well as debate the future of the Latin American and Caribbean ports and the transshipment business vs. the freight terminal business. node.name: 2nd GCC Supply Chain & Logistics Conference
node.description: The 2nd GCCSCL Conference is one of the important events of its kind, bringing together senior executives and professionals from various industries within the region and international to share insights and views on how to drive logistics and supply chain operations forward. The conference will also highlight emerging opportunities in Oman’s world-class ports, airports and free zones and its important role in the Gulf region and Indian Ocean rim its terms of trade flow.

node.name: 3rd International Istanbul Smart Grid Congress and Fair
node.description: The main purpose of smart grids is to prevent power cuts through automatic measuring systems by conducting situation analysis; to provide grid reliability by controlling over loads and failures; to include renewable energy resources into the system and; to control uncontrollable, untraceable energy consumption and losses via this system.

node.name: 5th Annual Energy Trading Regulations and Compliance 2015 Summit
node.description: The Summit will gather National and European Regulators; Associations active in the energy trading sector, as well as leading Energy Trading Companies and Banks across Europe and globally, to share their insights on steps to implementation of the regulations. There will be presentations, case studies, panel discussions and workshops around each regulation, with the aim of clarifying remaining uncertainties to help the industry move forward.

node.name: The 1st Gulf Marine Environmen​t Conference (GMEC)
node.description: On behalf of the organizing committee, we would like to invite you to participate at the 1st Gulf Marine Environment Conference(GMEC), with the theme “One Sea Cooperative Action”. The conference objective

node.name: Global Female Leaders 2015
node.description: The Global Female Leaders Summit brings together high-achieving leaders from all over the world. It gives focus to new ways of thinking and presents aspects we think we already understand from a new and unfamiliar perspective. This summit enables women to start a dialogue

node.name: 2nd Annual South Caucasus Infrastructure & New Energy Investment Summit
node.description: Armenia, Georgia and Azerbaijan are entering a new phase of consolidation of their economy. Having considerably improved their business environment, South Caucasus countries have achieved their transformation from a post-Soviet basket case economy to a shining example of what determination and focused reform can do.

node.name: EcoWASTE
node.description: EcoWASTE is designed to cover the entire solid waste management services and solutions required to address the dramatic increase per capita of waste production in the region and the new methods of reusing, reducing and recycling whilst maintaining a sustainable environment.

node.name: ASEAN Corporate Sustainability Summit
node.description: The ASEAN Corporate Sustainability Summit now on its 3rd year is a marquee event on the calendar of sustainability professionals in the region owing to its strong positioning, progressive theming that builds from the feedback year-on-year and most importantly the drive amongst the practitioners to exchange, enable and excel - the very purpose of our summit!

node.name: LATIN AMERICA AND CARIBBEAN OIL & GAS SECURITY FORUM 2015
node.description: Latin America is estimated to hold a fifth of the world’s oil, and several countries have made major strides to create a healthy investment climate and open up their potential to international companies in recent years, including Brazil, Colombia and Mexico. However, security is still a key issue for foreign and national companies in the region, and effective security planning is the key element for Latin America’s huge oil and gas potential to be realised.

node.name: East Africa Energy Infrastructure Security 2015 Forum
node.description: In the last half-decade a number of East African countries have emerged as global energy frontiers and as a result the region is increasingly attractive to major IOCs. The recent hydrocarbon success and impressive energy infrastructure development have however, been undermined by a string of recent militant attacks, along with intensifying terrorist activities and ethnic conflicts in the region.

node.name: PIPELINE SECURITY FORUM 2015
node.description: There are currently over 3,500,000 km of pipelines transporting hydrocarbons – the major source of primary energy - around the world.

node.name: The Arab Achievers Conclave
node.description: At a time of great reshaping, optimism and hope in the Arab World, entrepreneurs, especially the youth, have found new avenues in leading innovation. Large-scale transformations in some countries, combined with social dynamism particularly among the youth, have clearly put the employment challenge on the top of the regional agenda, with entrepreneurship being a key imperative.

node.name: Africa Future Energy Forum
node.description: Global Energy Initiative and MCI-Middle East will be co-hosting the Africa Future Energy Forum on 18 – 19 March 2015 in Nairobi, Kenya. Themed as Unlocking Africa's Energy Potential, the forum will bring together major stakeholders to discuss the policy, technology, and financing aspects of unlocking Africa's energy potential.

node.name: The Kuwait Bridges & Highways Forum
node.description: The Kuwait Bridges & Highways Forum is your exclusive opportunity to hear directly from project owners about their plans and requirements in order to attract quality partners to deliver on the national vision.

node.name: The Kuwait Contractors Forum
node.description: The Kuwait Contractors Forum is dedicated to exploring the opportunities and overcoming the bureaucratic, strategic and technical challenges facing contractors in this market.

node.name: The WIEF Roundtable
node.description: The WIEF Roundtable was designed as a unique extension of the WIEF Annual Forum. This programme provided an avenue where regional and local business leaders could congregate to leverage existing business and economic strengths and define key steps and measures to take in order to transform a common vision to reality.

node.name: The Indo-UAE Legal Summit 2014
node.description: Musthafa & Almana is delighted to announce its annual flagship event – the Indo-UAE Legal Summit 2014 in association with co-hosts Dubai Judicial Institute.

node.name: SkyTech 2015

node.name: 3rd Annual APAC Bancassurance Forum
node.description: Bancassurance as a concept originated in Europe where it holds about one third of the total market share and has slowly & steadily assumed a central role in the business strategy of many financial institutions.

node.name: The 17th Buildexpo 2014
node.description: The 17th Buildexpo 2014 - International Trade Expo on Building & Construction Products, Eqpt. & Machinery is the largest trade event held annually in Tanzania. The exhibition attracts exhibitors from more than 30 countries and visitors from all over East & Central Africa, thus giving exhibitors an excellent opportunity to explore several countries in one time.

node.name: The 17th AUTOEXPO 2014
node.description: The 17th AUTOEXPO 2014 - International Trade Expo on Automotives, Spare parts, Accessories & Transportation is the largest trade event held annually in Tanzania.The exhibition attracts exhibitors from more than 28 countries and visitors from all over East & Central Africa, thus giving exhibitors an excellent opportunity to explore several countries in one time.

node.name: The 2nd European Credit and Counterparty Risk Conference
node.description: The 2nd European Credit and Counterparty Risk Conference will bring together leading professionals from the banking, insurance and investment sectors from across Europe to discuss what is now and will be the innovative strategies for credit and counterparty risk, stress testing, credit portfolio management, Basel III requirements, embedding risk in organizational culture and many other topics facing senior executives today in the financial risk industry.

node.name: Kazan Summit
node.description: KazanSummit is one of the leading international economic events of Russian Federation and Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC). First time it was held in 2009. From first day of existence summit has been held under patronage of President of Tatarstan Republic Rustam Nurgalievich Minnikhanov. Since 2012 Russian and OIC member countries’ work is strongly supported by Federation Council of Federal Assembly of Russian Federation.

node.name: EMLAK 14 - Real Estate Fair Turkey
node.description: The fair, as well as being a commercial platform, will contribute to the development of the sector through the events to be held. In the seminars experts in their fields will give trainings regarding the considerations that should be paid attention to while purchasing a residence, using mortgage and other different subjects will be provided.

node.name: The 5th Annual World Islamic Banking Conference: Asia Summit
node.description: The 5th Annual World Islamic Banking Conference: Asia Summit (WIBC Asia 2014), scheduled to be held on the 2nd, 3rd and 4th June 2014 in Singapore under the official patronage of the Monetary Authority of Singapore, will build on its successful foundation as a large-scale international platform for enabling the further development of Islamic finance.

node.name: The 10th Anniversary World Islamic Funds and Financial Market Conference
node.description: The 10th Anniversary special edition of the World Islamic Funds and Financial Markets Conference (WIFFMC 2014) which is scheduled to be held on the 19th & 20th of May 2014 in the Kingdom of Bahrain again under the official patronage of the Central Bank of Bahrain, is set to be a one-of-a-kind spectacle that will celebrate the growth, excellence and achievements in the global Islamic investment industry.
